document.full_text: kori c. hazel, a high school senior from denver, describes stepping off the plane from a school trip and "through the doors of heartbreak, as only paper apologies can deliver.''
document.title: a high-flying senior spring is brought to earth
lines_and_colors: kori c. hazel, a high school senior from denver, describes stepping off the plane from a school trip and "through the doors of heartbreak, as only paper apologies can deliver.''
